name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 432   Daily Inverter Startup After Battery Depletion
description:
This proof documents the daily operation of the off-grid electrical system at MaMeeFarm™, recorded on
2026-01-03 at 08:43 (Asia/Bangkok).

The inverter system was turned on in the morning after being shut down at 00:30 the previous night.
The system issued an alert indicating that the stored battery power had been fully depleted.

This record reflects the reality of working under limited energy resources in an off-grid environment, where electricity availability directly constrains daily operations within the DGCP system.

No simulation, reenactment, or external power source was involved.
